verses.roman:
yāvat ācārya-gṛhe nimāñira avasthāna
muñi bhikṣā dimu, sabākāre māgoṅ dāna

synonyms: yāvat—as long as; ācārya-gṛhe—in the house of Advaita Ācārya; nimāñira—of Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu; avasthāna—the stay; muñi—I; bhikṣā dimu—shall supply the food; sabākāre—everyone; māgoṅ—I beg; dāna—this charity.
translation: Mother Śacī appealed to all the devotees to give her this charity: As long as Śrī Caitanya Mahāprabhu remained at the house of Advaita Ācārya, only she would supply Him food.
